instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: harin 820-4924 fan full, cpu underclocked
threads.message:
2015 pro came in with a high fan spin and really slow os
inspection
corrosion on I/O board, replaced I/O board same problem
asd efi reports
there may be an issue with the power management system ref PPN001
there may be an issue with the smc ref pfm006
istat menus installed, shows nothing abnormal
removed jtag (because f apple)
corrosion around u5870, reflow, boots really slow and about 80% glitches out and turns to a white screen
u5870 and surrounds replaced, ultrasonic, alcohol, dry

threads.title: harin 820-4924 fan full, cpu underclocked
threads.message:
Does it boot into diagnostics now? 
So it cannot boot OSX and crashes?

threads.title: harin 820-4924 fan full, cpu underclocked
threads.message: after the white screen it starts the booting screen again

threads.title: harin 820-4924 fan full, cpu underclocked
threads.message:
no, now the keyboard and trackpad seem to be not working, 
it looks like its booting without the trackpad cable plugged in, slow
then it glitches out goes white and then to some menu, maybe recovery

threads.title: harin 820-4924 fan full, cpu underclocked
threads.message: That looks like a RAM issue. Could be corrosion under RAM or CPU or anywhere in the RAM circuit really.
